## Problem 1
```{r prob_one}
library(moderndive) #load the package
data("early_january_weather") #load dataset in 
View(early_january_weather) #look at data
```
This dataset describes weather conditions in early January at EWR. The column names are `r colnames(early_january_weather)`. There are `r ncol(early_january_weather)` columns and `r nrow(early_january_weather)` rows. The mean temperature is `r round(mean(early_january_weather$temp), digits = 2)` F.
